    • Constructor Detail

      • Ball

        public Ball(Paddle paddle)
        Generate new Ball.

        The ball which is being generated will have the height of 15 and width of 15. It will be placed just above the paddle in the middle of the paddle.

        Parameters:
        paddle - To which paddle we want the ball to center

      • Ball

        public Ball(int x,
    int y,
    int height,
    int width)
        Generate new Ball, with custom starting position and size.
        Parameters:
        x - Initial x position of the Ball.
        y - Initial y position of the Ball.
        height - Height of the Ball.
        width - Width of the Ball.

    • Method Detail

      • setPaddle

        public void setPaddle(Paddle paddle)
        Assign a paddle for the ball, this is the paddle we want the ball to reset into.
        Parameters:
        paddle - the paddle that is being assigned for the ball

      • move

        public void move()
        If ball is moving, set balls new position with the movement adjustments.

      • launchBall

        public void launchBall()
        Set balls movement true, which allows moving the ball

      • reverseHorizontalMomentum

        public void reverseHorizontalMomentum()
        Reverse horizontal movement. If ball was moving left change it to move right and vice versa

      • reverseVerticalMomentum

        public void reverseVerticalMomentum()
        Reverse vertical movement. If ball was moving upwards change it to move downwards and vice versa

      • resetBall

        public void resetBall()
        Reset the ball on top of the paddle, in the middle of the paddle, and change movement into false

      • disableBall

        public void disableBall()
        Hide the ball from the player and set moving to false.
